message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.GR 

The paper deals with computer vision and machine learning techniques to differentiate between players of different teams in a sport game. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also uses a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to learn a descriptor, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the generalization of the method to new games/arenas, which is related to the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper deals with panoramic views of basketball games, which falls under the category of cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper discusses the integration of team separation in CNN-based sport analytics pipelines, which falls under the category of cs.GR (Graphics).
